hero.title: Papelería Abril –
hero.subtitle: Digital transformation for a local stationery store with modern vision.

about_client.title: About the client
about_client.description_1: Papelería Abril is a local business established in Tacuarembó, Uruguay, offering a wide range of school supplies, office items and personalized gifts.
about_client.description_2: With more than 10 years of experience in the market, they sought to modernize their digital presence to reach more customers in their region.

google_visibility.title: Google visibility
google_visibility.description: They needed to improve their presence in search engines to be found by potential customers in Tacuarembó and surrounding areas.

modernize_image.title: Modernize their online image
modernize_image.description: They wanted to project a professional and modern image that reflected the quality of their products and services.

show_catalog.title: Show their product catalog
show_catalog.description: They needed a simple way to display their extensive product catalog organized by categories.

responsive_design.title: Responsive web design and development
responsive_design.description: I created a modern and fully responsive website using React, ensuring a perfect experience on all devices.

catalog.title: Organized product catalog
catalog.description: I implemented a dynamic catalog system with category filtering, making it easy for customers to find exactly what they're looking for.

contact_integration.title: Contact and location integration
contact_integration.description: We integrated WhatsApp, contact form and Google Maps to facilitate communication and help customers find the physical store.

seo.title: Technical and local SEO
seo.description: We optimized the site with local keywords, meta tags, schema markup and relevant content to improve its positioning in local searches.

impact.title: Project impact
improvements: Active presence on Google Maps and local searches
First results in searches like "stationery Tacuarembó"
Organic growth from the first month of implementation
Greater visibility of products and special offers

testimonial.quote: We are delighted with the new site, now our customers find us easily on Google. The organization by categories has made it much easier to show our catalog and we have noticed an increase in queries and sales.
testimonial.author: Ana Martínez

cta.title: Ready to boost your local business?
cta.description: Contact me today and discover how my digital transformation strategy can boost your local business as I did with Papelería Abril.

hero.title: Web Development
hero.subtitle: Professional website for Antonio y Adama Gardening, specialists in gardening and landscaping services in Lloret de Mar.

overview.title: Professional Gardening Project
overview.description: Development of a professional website for Antonio y Adama Gardening, specialists in gardening and landscaping services. The project included modern web development, local SEO optimization for gardening services and optimized presence on Google Maps to attract local customers in Lloret de Mar.

services.title: Services Implemented
services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions to enhance the digital presence of a professional gardening business

web_development.title: Web Development
web_development.description: Modern and responsive website developed with the latest technologies, optimized to showcase gardening services and landscaping projects professionally.

seo_specialized.title: Specialized SEO
seo_specialized.description: SEO optimization specific to gardening services, including relevant keywords like "gardening Lloret de Mar" and search engine optimized structure.

google_maps.title: Google Maps
google_maps.description: Optimization of presence on Google Maps to attract local customers interested in gardening and landscaping services in Lloret de Mar.

responsive_design.title: Responsive Design
responsive_design.description: Fully responsive design that adapts perfectly to all devices, from mobile to desktop.

digital_portfolio.title: Digital Portfolio
digital_portfolio.description: Professional gallery to showcase gardening and landscaping projects with intuitive navigation and impactful visual presentation.

contact_optimized.title: Optimized Contact
contact_optimized.description: Optimized contact forms and clear contact information to facilitate communication with potential customers.

results.title: Results Obtained
results.subtitle: Measurable impact on the architect's digital presence

seo_improvement.title: SEO Improvement
seo_improvement.description: Improved positioning in searches related to gardening and landscaping services.

local_visibility.title: Local Visibility
local_visibility.description: Greater presence on Google Maps and local searches for architecture services.

more_queries.title: More Queries
more_queries.description: Significant increase in queries from potential customers interested in gardening services.

professional_image.title: Professional Image
professional_image.description: Website that projects professionalism and trust, improving brand perception.

cta.title: Need a Professional Website?
cta.description: Contact me today and turn your idea into reality with my professional web development experience.

hero.title: Cafetería
hero.subtitle: Complete digital transformation for cafeterianuevoyago.es. Web development, specialized local SEO and Google Maps presence optimization to increase local customers.

overview.title: Digital Transformation for Cafeteria
overview.description: Comprehensive digital transformation strategy for cafeterianuevoyago.es. The project included complete web development, specialized local SEO for restaurants and Google Maps presence optimization to increase local customers.

services.title: Services Implemented
services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions to enhance the digital presence of a local cafeteria

web_development.title: Web Development
web_development.description: Modern and attractive website developed specifically for cafeterias, with digital menu, product gallery and contact information.

local_seo.title: Local SEO
local_seo.description: Local SEO optimization specialized for restaurants and cafeterias, including keywords like "cafeteria near me" and "best local coffee".

google_maps.title: Google Maps
google_maps.description: Complete optimization of presence on Google Maps with updated information, hours, photos and reviews to attract local customers.

responsive_design.title: Responsive Design
responsive_design.description: Fully responsive design that adapts perfectly to mobile, tablets and desktops for an optimal experience on all devices.

user_experience.title: User Experience
user_experience.description: Intuitive and attractive interface that reflects the warmth and cozy atmosphere of the cafeteria, improving the customer experience.

digital_marketing.title: Digital Marketing
digital_marketing.description: Comprehensive digital marketing strategy that includes social media management and online promotion to increase cafeteria visibility.

results.title: Results Obtained
results.subtitle: Measurable impact on the cafeteria's digital presence

local_seo_improvement.title: Local SEO Improvement
local_seo_improvement.description: Improved positioning in local searches related to cafeterias and restaurants.

maps_visibility.title: Maps Visibility
maps_visibility.description: Greater presence on Google Maps with updated information and positive reviews.

more_customers.title: More Customers
more_customers.description: Significant increase in the number of local customers who discover the cafeteria online.

modern_image.title: Modern Image
modern_image.description: Website that projects modernity and professionalism, improving brand perception.

cta.description: Contact me today and discover how my digital transformation strategy can boost your local business.
